name: prompt-stash
title: Prompt Stash
description: Efficiently manage and organize your AI prompts. Save, tag, and favorite your most effective prompts for quick access across any LLM or chatbot.
author: renzo

commands.name: index
commands.title: Prompt Stash
commands.subtitle: Your AI prompt collection manager
commands.description: Manage your AI prompts with ease

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
